siteMetadata.title: rantum.dev
siteMetadata.subtitle: digital dwelling of andrew maury. digital developer @ecomloop in burlingame, ca. san matean nantucketer on a rantum scoot.

frontmatter.title: Write the story, don't let it happen
frontmatter.description: The story doesn't have to be perfect. Don't sit back and let it happen. Write the story.

frontmatter.title: Recognize the options and unknowns
frontmatter.description: Recognize the options and the unknowns. Control what is possible.

frontmatter.title: Find balance to keep moving
frontmatter.description: Find a balance with physical actions and mental awareness. Keep going to maintain balance.

frontmatter.title: Speak your mind in a tactful manner
frontmatter.description: In order to effectively communicate, be tactful about the message and how it is communicated.

frontmatter.title: Stay focused by taking time to reflect, pause, respond
frontmatter.description: It's easy to lose focus when others don't react as expected. Don't let it derail efforts.

frontmatter.title: Acknowledge common desires work backwards towards understanding actions
frontmatter.description: Acknowledge common desires work backwards towards understanding actions
